website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ RL2240HE is a 21.5-inch gaming monitor that delivers solid gaming performance at a reasonable price, though it's light on features and has trouble with displaying very light shades of gray.
pros: Good color and dark gray-scale performance

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this monitor in April and so far I love it. I haven't had any dead pixels and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor in April and so far I love it. I haven't had any dead pixels and the resolution is pretty good. I have a laptop and I needed a bigger screen, so I got this. It works great! It was very easy to install (instructions come with pictures, not words) and even though it comes with a CD, I never had to use it, it was that easy. I haven't any issues with it and I think this monitor is very high quality for such a price. I play lots of video games and I love the option to adjust the settings yourself and save them for game nights (called Gamer 1, 2, 3).
customer_reviews.author: mike wazowski

customer_reviews.title: The monitor looks great and turned right on as soon as I connected ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor looks great and turned right on as soon as I connected it to my computer. The description for this monitor says that it has built-in speakers but I have been unable to coax any kind of audio out of mine. I assume I just I got a bad egg that slipped through quality control, but I have a separate speaker system attached to my computer so it doesn't matter to me anyway. Other than the lack of audio, the monitor is great. The colors are rich, the pictures are crisp, and the screen is responsive. Even without working speakers, I'd still recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Cody R.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love it. For its price it's amazing a lot better than ones you'll find at this price. I personally love the yellow color, and the fact that you can't make and save your own personal preference settings of brightness, contrast ect. Just make sure if your using Console once you hooked it up turn on console first than monitor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for what it is
customer_reviews.text: For what it is it's great. It's a cheap but good gaming monitor in the standard size of 1080p. Its highly customizable video settings give you an edge in competitive multiplayer games. The Black eQualizer especially is a real game changer. My only complaint with it is the video quality. Things tend to be noticeably pixelated, even more so than my old monitor that was made in 2001, which is what I upgraded from. If you're looking for a monitor built for competitive gaming for a low price, then by all means I can recommend this, but if you're going for good graphics, you might want to buy a different monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: Plug & play. I didn't adjust anything, it was all perfect right out of the box. Very nice monitor at a good price. Great for gaming, surfing and anything else you do. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: emontvil

customer_reviews.title: A great personal gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: A great personal gaming monitor!!!! No external speakers so unless you have amplified speakers to plug into it, buy a good pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My Son Says It Is A Really Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He says it has good color quality if calibrated correctly, low lag input, and is perfect for 1st person shooters. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Not as pretty colors and deep with colors as my Samsung but for gaming PC this is the best responsiveness. Great price for 1ms.

customer_reviews.title: RTS 2 mode
customer_reviews.text: For the best image quality make sure you use RTS 2 mode. It works for everything, not just RTS games, and it has the best colors.
customer_reviews.author: The Growlanser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Amazing color and resolution. Perfect in every way​.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming. I use this to play games from my PS4 and it produces good quality with a great response time.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MONITOR! it doesnt have any speakers so just make sure you get some sort of headset, but its like playing on an old school tube tv.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Splendid monitor. Really bright out of the box and needed some adjustment. Game display graphics excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: great monitor, love the color of the monitor. the performance of the screen is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Coach Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my ps4 to replace an old 32 in flat screen when I made an office. Fantastic screen with vibrant colors, super smooth. Will be buying another for my PC asap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it almost felt like I got an upgraded graphics card
customer_reviews.text: I deal with computers all of the time, but I have my noob moments every once in a while. I'm going to be honest and say that I was using a TV screen with an HDMI cord before using this for a solid couple years. Switching over to this monitor was night and day difference, it almost felt like I got an upgraded graphics card. So overall if anyone was doing the same thing as me then get a pc monitor (in particular this one), and this is a pretty good monitor to own, especially on sale
customer_reviews.author: Late To The Table (Youtube)Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Quality, customizable settings, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and especially the ability to customize the monitor to my needs. This is for more than just gamers, anybody looking for quality monitor should get this.

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing!!! It would be nice if it had speakers but, if you're a gamer you play with headphones anyway.

product_meta.title: BenQ RL2240HE 22 inch Console Gaming Monitor
product_meta.description: Built to set the benchmark for console gaming monitors, the RL2240HE is a true testament to the belief that "gaming is in the details".
feature_bullets: 1ms Fast Response Time for ultra smooth console gaming experience
Black eQualizer enhance visual clarity in dark scene
RTS mode co- developed with professional gamer
Display Mode and Smart Scaling for quick screen size adjustment
1ms Fast Response Time for ultra smooth console gaming experience
RTS mode co- developed with professional gamer
Display Mode and Smart Scaling for quick screen size adjustment
